name: Get The Bug
description:
Get The Bug(or Shoot the Bug) is a scratch made Web browser game. This is a two player game. The mouse/touchpad controls the shooter and W A S D controls bug. This game was submitted to two jams, first  the Secret Santa 2021 jam. The giftee wanted a two player game with the theme insects. The game was made in Scratch and then because of this it was submitted to The Scratch Jam 2.

Mouse/Cursor - Your objective is to try and shoot the bug.

WASD - Your objective is to try and dodge the cursor.

Difficulties

Easy for BUG:  Faster Bug

Easy for CURSOR:  Bigger Cursor

Hard for BUG: Slower Bug

Hard for CURSOR:  Smaller Cursor

FEEDBACK IS TAKEN!
